extendedInfo.description: Eskimo Brothers are two guys that have slept with the same girl. It enters you into an eternal bond that can never be broken. Ever wonder if any of your facebook friends are really your Eskimo Brothers?Well now you can find out! It's easy! Just connect to facebook and we'll show you a list of your friends. Then select which of them you've slept with. Once you get some of your friends to do it too, we'll tell you which ones are your Eskimo Brothers!  Don't worry we wont post -ANY- of this publicly You can even become the Chief Eskimo and find out if you have other anonymous Eskimo Brothers across the globe!

reviews.title: Almost deserted
reviews.comment: I would be fun if there were a lot of ur friends.  Should consider making it free to expand customer base!
reviews.author: David Eladio Zayas Flores
